description: A convenient way to run python modules, packages and scripts with a dynamically discovered sys.path. Particularly useful when you want to make use of packages without installing them first, or to circumvent bootstrapping issues with complicated collections of python software.
longdescription: A convenient way to run python modules, packages and scripts with a dynamically discovered sys.path. Particularly useful when you want to make use of packages without installing them first, or to circumvent bootstrapping issues with complicated collections of python software.
